The Related Discourses

6. Feeling (cf. SN 36: Vedanā saṃyutta)

This group of sutras has the common theme of describing ...

The Feeling group consists of 31 sutras when abbreviated sutra variants are counted. The material is found in fascicle 17 of Taisho No. 99. Below is a list of the English translations currently available.

Note: Previous English translations currently available at SuttaCentral are referenced below. The reader should be aware that titles for SA sutras are supplied by the translator(s). The sutra numbering follows Yinshun’s reconstruction. The Taisho sutra numbers are noted for reference ("[T 99.xxx]").

  • 9. Subsiding (Pierquet) [T 99.474]
